column7: Unique identifier for the analysis performed for a particular set of samples
Unique identifier for the analyzed sample
Unique identifier for the protein-DNA interaction
Gene on the protein-DNA interaction area. Use Ensembl gene id. If no gene is affected, use -888 (not applicable).

Transcript on the protein-DNA interaction area. Use Ensembl transcript id. Separate multiple transcripts with vertical bars in the form of trasncriptA|trasncriptB|trasncriptC. If no trasncript is affected, use -888 (not applicable).
Version of Ensembl gene build used for annotation
